TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelativeSource extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class RelativeSource Inherits MarkupExtension Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 實作標記延伸，這個標記延伸描述與繫結目標位置相對的繫結來源位置。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中一個指定的繫結來源的方式是使用屬性。One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the property. 這是該屬性的屬性類型。This is the property type of that property. 同時是標記延伸實作和資料物件。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 當延伸模組會傳回本身 (請參閱)，資料中包含的相關資訊。When the extension returns itself (see ), the relevant information is contained in the data. 標記延伸的主要用途是允許以屬性形式的變數引數建構函式語法以便模式可以是內部定義的兩個額外的引數的上階類型和其他模式不需要的層級。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require. 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範建立樣式觸發程序，報告驗證錯誤訊息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. 使用屬性 setter 的值繫結至目前的錯誤內容(使用樣式)。Using the property, the value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style). 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#5)] 下列範例所示定義的自訂控制項稱為`NumericUpDown`。The following example shows the definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`. 屬性繫結至`Value`相關物件`TemplatedParent`，也就是`NumericUpDown`控制這個在此情況下套用至。The property of the is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this is applied to in this case. [!code-xaml[CustomControlNumericUpDown#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/themes/generic.xaml#relativesource)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[NumericUpDown 自訂控制項搭配主題和 UI 自動化支援範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025). 下列傳回第二個向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

Public Sub New (mode As RelativeSourceMode, ancestorType As Type, ancestorLevel As Integer)
public: RelativeSource(System::Windows::Data::RelativeSourceMode mode, Type ^ ancestorType, int ancestorLevel);

param.name: mode

span.span: One of the values.

param.span: 這個簽章若要相關，這就應該是 。

span.span: For this signature to be relevant, this should be .
The of ancestor to look for.

param.name: ancestorLevel
param.span: 在所有屬於特定型別祖系當中，所需祖系的序數位置。

span.span: The ordinal position of the desired ancestor among all ancestors of the given type.

summary.span: 以初始模式加上尋找所需相對來源的額外樹狀目錄結構導覽限定詞，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ancestorType` 和`ancestorLevel`具有不相關，如果做為參數指定`mode`以外。`ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than . 請勿使用此簽章其他值。Do not use this signature for the other values. ## Examples 下列傳回第二個向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要尋找的祖系層級，採用 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of ancestor to look for, in mode.

summary.span: 使用 1 來表示最接近繫結目標項目的項目。

span.span: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
The ancestor level.

value.span: 使用 1 來表示最接近繫結目標項目的項目。

span.span: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性未設定明確地設定或屬性會以隱含方式鎖定屬性值設定為。If the property is not set explicitly, setting the or the property will implicitly lock the property value to . ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下列傳回第二個向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. summary.span: 取得或設定 值，這個值描述與繫結目標位置相對的繫結來源位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是唯讀，在初始化之後。This property is read-only after initialization. 如果這個屬性未明確設定，設定或和屬性會以隱含方式鎖定此屬性值設。If this property is not set explicitly, setting the or the and the properties will implicitly lock this property value to . ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).

exception.span: 初始化之後，這個屬性就是固定的屬性。

span.span: This property is immutable after initialization.

exception.span: 不要變更這個執行個體上的 ，而要建立新的 或使用不同的靜態執行個體。

span.span: Instead of changing the on this instance, create a new or use a different static instance.

summary.span: 取得靜態值，作用是傳回針對 模式建構的 。

span.span: Gets a static value that is used to return a constructed for the mode.
A static .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 四個中的三種值， ，或，可能會產生，是全部靜態的其中包含沒有唯一的私用值。Three of the four values, , , or , can produce a that is wholly static, containing no unique private values. 使用靜態屬性的所有可共用相同的物件，因而不須每次使用配置個別物件。All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use. 因此，使用靜態屬性，可降低記憶體使用量。Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).

Another .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時是標記延伸實作和資料物件。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 延伸模組會傳回本身的資料中包含的相關資訊。When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data. 標記延伸的主要用途是允許以屬性形式的變數引數建構函式語法以便模式可以是內嵌的定義，使用兩個額外的引數上階類型和其他模式不需要的層級。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 四個中的三種值， ，或，可能會產生，是全部靜態的其中包含沒有唯一的私用值。Three of the four values, , , or , can produce a that is wholly static, containing no unique private values. 使用靜態屬性的所有可共用相同的物件，因而不須每次使用配置個別物件。All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use. 因此，使用靜態屬性，可降低記憶體使用量。Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範建立樣式觸發程序，報告驗證錯誤訊息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. Setter 的值會繫結至目前的錯誤內容(使用樣式) 使用屬性。The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style) using the property. 請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)如需有關這個範例。See [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md) for more information on this example. summary.span: 指示是否應該保存 屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether the property should be persisted.

returns.span: 如果屬性值已經從其預設值變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[定義預設值使用 ShouldSerialize 和重設方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md).
